description:
Opening keynote by Joel Spolsky at Devoxx France 2016, Paris.

Every line of code has an impact on society. It might be a simple phone application that saves people time or an intricate programme that saves hundreds of lives. Technology is evolving and the effect it’s having on the world is monumental.
